content: keep the cold wind out with this easy cozy cowl pattern the chunky ribbing is made using half_double_crochet stitches worked in the back loop to create a warm and stretchy cowl both sides look the same so you can wear it folded it over or full height over your chin for those really cold days **skill level ** easy this pattern is written using us crochet terminology **recommended yarn** super chunky/bulky #5 or 6 weight check gauge in acrylic/wool/blend yarn approximately 85 5 yards/ 78 2m 3oz/85g **hooks & other materials** us size m 9 0mm yarn needle stitch marker scissors **sizes/finished measurements** approx 10 x 7 25 5 cm x 17 8cm this pattern has been tested for errors but should you have any problems please send me a message through ravelry **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved you may not copy or share any part it you may print it for your own use please do not alter it and try to claim it as your own pattern you may not use photographs of this pattern without permission you may not make tutorial videos from this pattern you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
